import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Header from "../Header"; import Footer from "../Footer"; // import "animate.css"; // from https://animate.style // import "@fancyapps/ui/dist/fancybox/fancybox.css"; import { Fancybox } from "@fancyapps/ui"; import { createIcons, Plane, Users, ShieldCheck, Award, HeartHandshake, } from "lucide-react"; export default function About() { useEffect(() => { // Initialize Lucide icons createIcons({ icons: { Plane, Users, ShieldCheck, Award, HeartHandshake }, }); // Initialize Fancybox (optional) Fancybox.bind("[data-fancybox]", {}); }, []); return ( <>
{/* Hero Section */}

About Us

Learn more about who we are and the values that guide our commitment to providing exceptional private aviation services.

{/* Our Story Section */}
Company Overview

Our Story

Founded with a vision to revolutionize private aviation, Aayo has grown from a small charter service to one of the most trusted names in luxury air travel.

Over the years, we've expanded our fleet, enhanced our services, and built lasting relationships with clients who value quality and dependability.

Our dedication to excellence has earned us the trust of thousands of satisfied clients who rely on us for their most important journeys.

{/* Core Values */}

Our Core Values

The principles that guide everything we do and shape our commitment to excellence.

Safety First

We maintain the highest standards in maintenance, pilot training, and safety operations to ensure every flight is secure.

Customer Focus

Our clients are at the heart of everything we do â€” we provide personalized service with attention to detail.

Excellence

We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, ensuring a world-class experience every time.

{/* Stats Section */}
